duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Field Operations Team and oversee multiple projects
Responsible for special reporting required for projects to customers and internal organizations
Provide assistance in entering and updating jobs in CRM
Ensure identified milestones on projects are being followed up and completed in a timely manner
Assist with access arrangements for major projects
Prepare slide decks for Senior Management meetings
Responsible for day-to-day operations and administrative activities of facilities
Take detailed notes during meetings and provide meeting minutes to the team
Keep an active log of off-site personnel entering remote locations

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent required
